mt.comm.socket

Class ServerCommSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • mt.comm.socket.ServerCommSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerCommSocket
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is responsible for handling sockets and streams between several clients and server.
